column4: What is the name of the graphics driver you got when not having activated the proprietary driver fglrx? I want to change to the old one by typing its name in xorg.conf, but then I need then name. : P
vesa is allmoust allways working option
no idea if that was last working driver for you

The vesa driver didn't work. :/ I have already tried it. What is there more to try? I have an ATI Radeon mobility X600, and when trying to boot, my screen gets stuck on a multi coloured distorted ubuntu logo. This happens just before the login prompt is to be shown. Before that, I can see the ubuntu logo load.
